description:
DraftSight is a professional-grade 2D design and drafting solution that lets you create, edit, view and markup any kind of 2D drawing.
Its familiar user interface makes it easy to transition from other comparable CAD applications.

* [Draftsight Feature Matrix](https://www.draftsight.com/media/feature-matrix-draftsight)
* [System Requirements](http://help.solidworks.com/2019/English/DraftSight/corporate/system_requirements.htm)
* [Draftsight 2020 FAQ](https://www.draftsight.com/media/draftsight-faq)

## Trialware
* DraftSight 2019 for Windows® is [offered in paid versions only](https://www.draftsight.com/?int_campaign=3DS_Home_Offerings).
* All free versions of DraftSight (2018 or earlier) will cease to run after 12/31/2019.

This package will install a trial that will work for 30 days before requiring registration.
summary: A professional-grade 2D design and drafting solution.
author: Dassault Systèmes
